header.note: The character "%" (out of a numerical context) is a meta-character that will be replaced (often by a numeric value) before the string is displayed
Text between less than (<) and greater than (>) symbols is a variable's name and must not be localised

trans-unit.source: The current file will be saved in a "Replaced Files (Compacting)" folder. The compacted file will become the new current file.
trans-unit.target: The current file will be saved in a "Replaced Files (Compacting)" folder. The compacted file will become the new current file.

trans-unit.target: The compacted structure file will become the new current structure file.

trans-unit.target: The current data file has not been moved or changed. Please use the checking and repair tools before attempting to compact again.

trans-unit.target: The available space on this volume (%1 MB) is insufficient.

trans-unit.target: The original data file was moved to the "Replaced files" folder. The compacted data file is now the current data file.

trans-unit.source: Use this option only if the standard repair was not successful. Some records might not be recovered. Using a backup file might be more efficient. Some deleted records might be recevored if the "secure delete" option was not activated.
